question: The term “Nirman Samvaad”, which was recently in news, is associated with which of the following ministries?
explanation: Recently, a one-day Mega Conclave called “Nirman Samvaad”, a first ever interaction between the Ministry of Railways and the Construction Industry was organised. This Conclave was organized by Rail Vikas Nigam Ltd. (RVNL), a dedicated arm of Ministry of Railways for fast track implementation of railway projects. The conclave aimed at taking measures to ensure expeditious implementation of ambitious Railway Infrastructure Development Plans.
